page.title: 07Glenalmond Recreation
page.content: MUSIC:{Facilities:}11 practice rooms, always open; Music Hall, numerous instruments.{Groups:}Choir-60 people, Orchestra-30 people, Concert Society, Music Club.{Survey}showed tastes include all types of music. DRAMA: Theatre seats 350 people. House plays,School play/opera (alternating). COMPUTERS: Room open on request. 10 BBCs, 3 printers, 5 disc drives. ART: Room open on half days. Exhibition on Commemoration Day. 3 potters wheels, kiln. WOODWORK: Room facilitates 22 boys. many machines. METALWORK: Room facilitates 12 boys. MAGAZINES: Chronicle:twice yearly, school events. Boys' magazine-yearly. SUPERNATURAL: School ghost:{CAPI}last seen in 1982. 'Mad Wifie's Curse': on occasion of 3rd major fire, school will slip into river.
